name: Emergent Garden
description:
In Emergent Garden you play as an earth hill can grow grass. You need to fill the entire garden with plants before the time runs out. But beware of the hungry ants that will eat the grass and hinder your progress...

Instructions:

Move by clicking and holding your left mouse button. Collect water droplets to increase your speed. Fill 85% of the ground with grass to win before time runs out.

This is a small project that I made in a couple of days for a Game Design course at ZHdK in Switzerland. Please have fun and take a small break with this relaxing*(?) game.

(*) This game may or may not be relaxing for certain people. Also there might be loud music.

What is your highscore?
